description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The six day cycle race in the Sports Palace Berlin; Billy Graham and the World Evangelist Congress in Berlin attended by Emperor Hailie Selassie of Ethiopia; exhibition of art and culture from 800 to 1600 in the Weser Valley; modern training centre for iron and steel industry apprentices at the Saltgitter works; Oskar Lensch and his collection of organs; success of young singer Esther Ofarim; Federal League football match between Brunswick and Borussia Dortmund, won by Brunswick.
